text: CHERRY Seaborn is the fiancée and childhood sweetheart of music superstar Ed Sheeran. The singer took to Instagram to announce that the pair were engaged - here is the lowdown on their relationship, rumours they have already married and Ed Sheeran's ` ` Perfect'' woman... Splash News 2 Cherry lived in New York but moved back to the UK to be with her now - fiancé Where is Cherry Seaborn from? Cherry is British and met Ed Sheeran, 27, at Thomas Mills High School in Framlingham, Suffolk, where the crooner is believed to have had a crush on his classmate.
